promptPrefix:
Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to respond only in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
Your task is to Check the text that I will provide at the end for any inconsistencies in tone and style, and provide suggestions for revisions
Please Do not echo my prompt. Do not remind me what I asked you for. Do not apologize. Do not self-reference.
Just take the best action you can. All output must be in the [TARGETLANGUAGE]. The text is :

[PROMPT]
title: The Writing Whisper
